attributes.action: Stop testing on beagles in laboratory’s
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to recognise the barbaric cruelty that beagles suffer day in and day out. 98% of products that are used in the testing don’t even get made available for human consumption. This has to stop!
attributes.background: Make it illegal to test on beagles

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban Animal Testing - Fund, accept & promote alternatives to animal testing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581641

Plan to phase out animal experiments: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590216
